title: Current Analysis
details: Our first step is understanding your current payment processes and pos solution in addition to your overall costs for these solutions.   What pricing method is your merchant account, are you PCI compliant, your monthly/yearly pos software fees, are you accepting payments online, what contracts are you locked into.

Our second meeting we present multiple price point solutions that are tailored to your budget.  All our offerings address card acceptance rates, attaining PCI Compliance, solutions to grow your business and how to get out of your locked in contracts.

title: Ongoing  Support
details: All merchants have a dedicated team member who creates a customized ongoing service and support plan for your business.  Our industry is constantly changing and ever-increasing compliance requirements.   Most merchants never see their rep after the initial setup, its time you have a merchant professional representing your business and looking out for you.  You are not a number to Grandco.
